Program from the 121st anniversary banquet of the Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York, dating from 1905.
Program from the 121st anniversary banquet of the Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York, dating from 1905.
Program from the 121st anniversary banquet of the Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York, dating from 1905.
The Society of the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick in the City of New York was founded in 1784 as a charitable and social organization for Irish Americans residing in New York City.
Source and date of acquisition unknown.
